LanguageData.CrashedPsychicEmanatorShipPart.label: ship part (psychic)
LanguageData.CrashedPsychicEmanatorShipPart.descripti: A mysterious crashed piece of a spaceship. It may contain any manner of deadly defenders and exotic materials. This one seems to be emanating psychic waves.
LanguageData.CrashedPoisonShipPart.label: ship part (poison)
LanguageData.CrashedPoisonShipPart.description: A mysterious crashed piece of a spaceship. It may contain any manner of deadly defenders and exotic materials. This one seems to be killing plant life around it.
LanguageData.ShipChunk.label: ship chunk
LanguageData.ShipChunk.description: A chunk of a spacecraft. Can be deconstructed to yield useful resources.
